dct_title_s: Rebel line of works at Blakely captured by the Army of West Miss., April 9, 1865 position & approaches by the Union forces.
dct_description_sm: Union positions are colored blue, and Confederate works are red. Includes roads, vegetation, drainage, and relief by hachures.  Description derived from published bibliography.
dct_creator_sm: United States. Army. Corps of Engineers.
dcat_keyword_sm: United States History Civil War, 1861 1865 Battlefields Maps
